<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Dreamtime Tea](/Equipment.aspx?ID=628)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 121</row>

**Price** 13 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This lemony tea blended from rare Vudrani herbs and flowers is widely circulated by occult circles looking to transcend the boundaries of reality. The saving throw for addiction to dreamtime tea is DC 19.

**Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 30 minutes; **Stage 1** [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 minute); **Stage 2** [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) and can ask a question with the effects of [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) except the flat check DC is 10 (10 minutes)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dreamtime Tea

The saving throw for addiction to dreamtime tea is DC 19.
